caption.p: (a) A 13-year-old asymptomatic male patient infected with the 2019-nCoV, with a history of close contact with confirmed 2019-nCoV-infected patients. The bedside radiograph indicated no obvious abnormality. (b) A 3-year-old male patient, presented with a stuffy nose and rhinorrhoea, with a history of close contact with confirmed 2019-nCoV-infected patients. Bedside radiographs indicated increased and/or disordered bilateral bronchovascular shadows and dense hilar shadows.
